nbttag: {HideFlags:254,display:{Lore:[0:"§7§7Penned by the enigmatic",1:"§7merchant, Sirius, this tome",2:"§7unveils his 'humble' origins,",3:"§7draped in shadow and affluence.",4:"§7A tale of ambition where modesty",5:"§7meets grandeur.",6:"",7:"§8§l* §8Co-op Soulbound §8§l*",8:"§5§lEPIC"],Name:"§5Shadows indicate riddles, illuminating unseen stars"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"SIRIUS_BOOK"}}
